name: Pretty Girls Klondike Solitaire
description:
Let's play some Klondike "Solitaire" with the girls from the "Pretty Girls" series!
Play against 10 Pretty Girls each stage and dress them up in different outfits!
Clear Solitaire and earn new costumes!

■ Solitaire
Solitaire with Klondike rules.
Move the cards in the field so that the numbers and colors alternate.
See if you are able to arrange all the cards in order!

■ The stage takes place at school! Challenge the girls and win!
There are 7 characters + 3 secret characters.
As you clear the stage, a new costume will begin to reveal itself.
All characters are voiced!

■ Character introduction
・ AIRI MUTOH
Very popular at school because she is playful and loved by everyone.

・ MAYU
She is quiet and shy, she is very academic focused.

・ NAGISA HAYAMA
A perfect student, who can excel at studying as well as playing sports. She is loved by all students.

・ SERIKA SHIINA
A student with the highest grades and is also the Director of the Literature Department. She is a quiet girl who is inclusive to those around her.

・ SHIORI SHINOTO
She is a strong speaker and knows a lot about class subjects and school personnel.

・ SENA
An honor student who is also really good at playing sports.

・ HONOKA
A bright and innocent girl. She is admired as an idol of the school.

In addition, there are three hidden characters ...! ??

※All characters in this game are over the age of 18.
※This is a puzzle game with sexy characters (no nudity). Characters and character images used under license from their respective owners.
